execution_plan.description: Find the earliest visit date and all customer IDs for receipts on that earliest date from the receipts database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT CustomerId, Date FROM receipts WHERE Date = (SELECT MIN(Date) FROM receipts);

execution_plan.description: Get the firstname and lastname for the customers identified in step 1 from the customers database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, firstname, lastname FROM customers WHERE id IN ($step1.CustomerId);
